00037 class SmsSocketListener {
00038     enum {
00039         c_max_subscribed_contexts = APOXI_SMSSOCKET_MAX_SUBSCRIBED_APPS,
00040         c_max_cached_tpdus = APOXI_SMSSOCKET_MAX_CACHED_TPDUS,
00041         c_max_confirm_info = c_max_subscribed_contexts * c_max_cached_tpdus
00042     };
00043 
00044     friend class SmsSocket;
00045     friend class SmsSocketSignalMapTableNode;
00046     public:
00047         // one time initialization method (called in init method of referring system - StackControl::OnPowerUp())
00048         static void Startup();
00049 
00053         static BOOLEAN Register(SmsSocket *sms_socket);
00054 
00057         static SmsSocket* GetSocket(SmsPortNo sms_port_no);
00058 
00060         static BOOLEAN Unregister(SmsSocket *sms_socket);
00061 
00063         static BOOLEAN IsInUse(SmsPortNo sms_port_no);
00064 
00066         static BOOLEAN HasPorts(ExecutionContext *context = 0);
00067 
00069         static BOOLEAN Subscribe(ExecutionContext *context);
00070 
00072         static BOOLEAN Unsubscribe(ExecutionContext *context);
00073 
00076         static BOOLEAN Confirm(ExecutionContext *context, SmsPortNo portno, BOOLEAN accept);
00077 
00079         static BOOLEAN EmptyCache(SmsPortNo portno);
00080 
00081         // dump debug info
00082         static void DumpTables();
00083 
00084     private:
00085         struct ConfirmInfo {
00086             ExecutionContext* m_context;
00087             Tpdu *        m_tpdu;
00088             SmsPortNo     m_portno;
00089             BOOLEAN       m_confirmed;
00090             BOOLEAN       m_confirmed_state;
00091         };
00092 
00093         class Lock : public MutexObtainer {
00094             public:
00095                 Lock() : MutexObtainer(&SmsSocketListener::m_mutex) { };
00096         };
00097         friend class Lock;
00098 
00099         static BOOLEAN m_initialized;
00100         static Mutex m_mutex;
00101         static LinkedList<SmsSocket>   m_sms_socket_list;
00102         static ExecutionContext* m_subscribed_contexts[c_max_subscribed_contexts];
00103         static Tpdu *                  m_cached_tpdus[c_max_cached_tpdus];
00104         static ConfirmInfo             m_confirm_info[c_max_confirm_info];
00105 
00106 
00107         // Processes new incoming signal, stored socket info and sends back acknowledge to stack
00108         static void ProcessIncomingPortSms(const ProcessPtr &process_ptr);
00109         
00110         /* Returns the next socket found for the given context, starting the search 
00111             (in global list) with *sms_socket. Locking, if needed, must be done from calling instance. */
00112         static SmsSocket* SearchSocket(ExecutionContext *context, SmsSocket *sms_socket = 0);
00113 
00114         /* Returns the next socket with the port number sms_port_no, starting the search 
00115             (in global list) with *sms_socket. Normally there exists only one socket for one port number! 
00116             Locking, if needed, must be done from calling instance. */
00117         static SmsSocket* SearchSocket(SmsPortNo sms_port_no, SmsSocket *sms_socket = 0);
00118 
00119         // Checks if an context is subscribed
00120         static BOOLEAN IsSubscribed(ExecutionContext *context);
00121         // Checks if any context is subscribed
00122         static BOOLEAN HasSubscription();
00123 
00124         // puts Tpdu into the cache
00125         static BOOLEAN PutIntoCache(Tpdu * tpdu);
00126         // remove Tpdu from cache
00127         static BOOLEAN RemoveFromCache(Tpdu * tpdu);
00128         // insert the confirmation information
00129         static BOOLEAN InsertConfirmInfo(ExecutionContext* context, Tpdu* tpdu, SmsPortNo smsportno);
00130         // checks if a tpdu with a certain portno can be deleted out of the cache, when 
00131         // all contexts have confirmed and no context was interested
00132         static BOOLEAN CheckTpduDeletion(SmsPortNo portno);
00135         static BOOLEAN PushTpdus(SmsSocket * socket);
00136 
00138         static void DeleteConfirmInfo(Tpdu * tpdu);
